channel.title: [508] What the hell?
channel.description:
What is this?
[code] Exception in thread "Thread-0" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -129 at palidino76.rs2.players.Player.dropAllItems(Player.java:1517) at palidino76.rs2.players.Player.applyDead(Player.java:1732) at palidino76.rs2.players.Player.process(Player.java:1350) at palidino76.rs2.Engine.run(Engine.java:168) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/code]
This gets printed on run.bat every now and again then the server crashes.

item.title: [508] What the hell?
item.dc:creator: @King_Lingerz King Lingerz
item.description:
